Patent Information.Abstract: Provided are peptide and peptide consensus sequences, which inhibit bacterial growth and/or viral growth and mimic the activity of LL-37, CRAMP, and/or FALL-39. The peptides are useful as antimicrobials, anti-inflammatories and anti-viral agents.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.14978112]Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus mprF (MIC=8 µM), Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC=16 µM), Group A Staphylococcus aureus (GAS) (MIC=8 µM);Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli O29 (MIC=8 µM);Yeast:Candida albicans ATCC 14053 (MIC=4 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.14978112]6% hemolytic activity at 44 μM against human erythrocytes
Sequence Information.Function: Has hemolytic activity against human erythrocytes .

Literature.Title: Postsecretory processing generates multiple cathelicidins for enhanced topical antimicrobial defense.
Literature.Author: Murakami M, Lopez-Garcia B, Braff M, Dorschner RA, Gallo RL.
